title: Sick of Bots in Treeline. PLEASE DO SOMETHING!
body: Been lobbying for some TT attention for so long now. Still, bots are allowed to roam freely, ruining the game. PLEASE ADDRESS THIS ISSUE

replies.body: Yup, they're in ARAM too, and occasionally even Summoner's Rift. Even though my account is level 30 and I'm doing way better than the bots I still get matched up with them around 1 in 4 games. On certain times of day or night I seem to get a lot more bots in my games too.

Ya know how they got rid of bots in dominion?

They removed dominion.
Kill them and don't let them cs and report them for feeding. Problem solved {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
